entitymodel.title: Entity of an Apache OFBiz Component

view-entity.title: Picklist and PicklistBin and PicklistItem View Entity
Picklist Item and Bin View Entity
ShipmentReceipt And Inventory Item View Entity
Carrier And Shipment Method Type View Entity
Order Shipment Information View Entity
view-entity.description: This view is meant for getting all tracking information for all shipments associated with an order, it does not include information to determine which packages in a given shipment correspond to that order, or to determine what information applies to each line item of the order.

field.name: saveCertInfo
field.description: Setting to save files needed for UPS certification (true|false)

field.name: codAllowCod
field.description: All shipment package items are from orders which have been fully paid via EXT_COD

field.name: codSurchargeApplyToPackage
field.description: Surcharge amount will be applied to each shipment package

field.name: codFundsCode
field.description: The code that indicates the type of funds used for the COD payment

field.name: boxLength
field.description: This field store the length of package; if a shipmentBoxTypeId is specified then this overrides the dimension specified there; this field is meant to be used when there is no applicable ShipmentBoxType

field.name: boxHeight
field.description: This field store the height of package; if a shipmentBoxTypeId is specified then this overrides the dimension specified there; this field is meant to be used when there is no applicable ShipmentBoxType

field.name: boxWidth
field.description: This field store the width of package; if a shipmentBoxTypeId is specified then this overrides the dimension specified there; this field is meant to be used when there is no applicable ShipmentBoxType

field.name: dimensionUomId
field.description: This field store the unit of measurement of dimension (length, width and height)

view-entity.title: Shipment Package Route Detail View Entity
view-entity.description: View to list information about individual packages with route information, for getting the carrier labels for a package.

view-entity.title: Shipment Route Segment Detail View Entity
view-entity.description: View to list a shipment route segment with extra shipment information, for scheduling shipment route segments

view-entity.title: Shipment Route Segment Detail View Entity
view-entity.description: View to report ShipmentPackageContent quantity vs. OrderItem quantity via ItemIssuance
